<title level="1" right="Rules">[Feats and Features](/Rules.aspx?ID=1327)</title>

**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 192

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The _Core Rulebook_ presents a character progression carefully designed to offer plenty of options and depth without overwhelming players with too many choices at once. However, you can use the Pathfinder rules to create an infinite number of variant progressions. If your group wants more powerful characters, specific themes for all characters, or the like, you can implement these variants.
</column>
